title: Goodbye Lynn
brief_description: Tells the story of Lynn, a teenager, unwed and pregnant, and the problems she faces with her family, school friends, teachers, doctors and her boyfriend. Focuses on the interpersonal relationships and emotional stresses that affected the girl.
